Boston Local Exclusive Event!

Don't miss your chance to pitch to Local Investor Panelists.

Please join us for the October 24th Ultra Light Startups Feedback Forum and Pitch Showdown event

Please note that we do not charge admission for Ultra Light Startups events in Boston but you must reserve an Eventbrite ticket at the link below because  the venue will reach capacity!
    

  • View Event Details and Reserve your Ticket
    * YOU MUST RESERVE AN EVENT TICKET*
     

Startups should not miss their chance to "Pitch Your Company" 
- Please review the Pitch FAQ's and reserve a Pitch ticket

      

 

Boston Investor Panel

  • Glenn Champagne(@Twitter), Advisor at The Capital Network and Managing Director at DataPoint Ventures
  • Rob Menn (@Twitter), Senior Associate at Gemini Investors
  • Chris Lhulier (@Twitter), Attorney and Startup Advisor at Mintz Levin 
        



Agenda

  • 6:30pm – Feedback Forum – 10 startups pitch to a Live In-Person Boston Investor panel; the panel provides feedback for each pitch
  • 8:15pm –  Pitch Showdown - audience voting via Twitter; winners announced and prizes awarded
  • 8:30pm –  Drinks at nearby location

 
Feedback Forum and Pitch Showdown is a brand new format for Ultra Light Startups.  It is designed to serve the following purposes:

  Help early stage startups refine their business and revenue models

  • Help the audience see how investors evaluate startup pitches
  • Award prizes to the most viable startups, based on audience voting

 

In contrast to past Ultra Light Startups events, the panel and the startup pitches are integrated into a single session. Startups pitch to a panel of investors, who are also successful entrepreneurs.  Each startup gives a pitch and brief demonstration of his/her product.  The panel and audience ask follow-up questions after each pitch.  The panel gives constructive feedback to each startup pitching.  At the end of the series of pitches, the audience votes for their favorite pitches via Twitter.  The winners are announced and prizes are awarded.  Then we go for drinks nearby.

 

BOSTON Hosts: 

  • Cris De Luca (@crisdeluca), Co-Founder/Moderator, Ultra Light Startups Boston
  • David Ulrich, WorkBar Boston﻿
